othello.model

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • othello.model.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmdListener

    public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmdListener
    The GameState class manages the state of the game. Including who is playing, and how to swich who is playing.
